title: You are to Me - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Flashbacks   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Love at First Sight   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Mysterious Past   Past Plays a Big Role   Unreliable Narrator
author: Nakazato Mitsuru   中里十
description:
Every shopping district used to have them, the gods of commercial blessings called Blessed Ones.  Now, one is coming to my local shopping district. Most are supposed to be old ladies but this one is…a third year middle schooler.

Not only that, she’s got a “butler” accompanying her and they transferred together into my class! It’s custom for Blessed Ones to never touch money so apparently the “butler” is supporting her in her daily life. But still, never touching money? That’s crazy!

What’s the truth behind it all? And why, why does she smile so wildly? I can’t stop thinking about her… Is this love?>
